SEARCH
Package org.anchoranalysis.image.core.dimensions.size.suggestion

Interface ImageSizeSuggestion

public interface ImageSizeSuggestion
A suggestion on a size for an image.
Author:
Owen Feehan

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    ScaleFactor
    calculateScaleFactor(Optional<Extent> extentToBeScaled)
    Calculates the scaling factor.
    Optional<Integer>
    uniformHeight()
    A specific height, if one exists, to which each image should be resized.
    Optional<ScaleFactor>
    uniformScaleFactor()
    A ScaleFactor, if one exists, that is applied uniformally, independent of the Extent to be scaled.
    Optional<Integer>
    uniformWidth()
    A specific width, if one exists, to which each image should be resized.

  • Method Details

    • calculateScaleFactor

      ScaleFactor calculateScaleFactor(Optional<Extent> extentToBeScaled) throws OperationFailedException
      Calculates the scaling factor.
      Parameters:
      extentToBeScaled - dimensions of the source image/entity that will be scaled, if they are known.
      Returns:
      the scaling-factor to use
      Throws:
      OperationFailedException - if insufficient information is available to calculation a factor.

    • uniformScaleFactor

      Optional<ScaleFactor> uniformScaleFactor()
      A ScaleFactor, if one exists, that is applied uniformally, independent of the Extent to be scaled.
      Returns:
      such a scale-factor, if it exists. Optional.empty() if it does not exist.

    • uniformWidth

      Optional<Integer> uniformWidth()
      A specific width, if one exists, to which each image should be resized.
      Returns:
      the width if it exists, otherwise Optional.empty().

    • uniformHeight

      Optional<Integer> uniformHeight()
      A specific height, if one exists, to which each image should be resized.
      Returns:
      the height if it exists, otherwise Optional.empty().
